content: I just noticed many links in the FHIR core are using the IHE wiki, which was the right thing a few years ago. But now most of the ITI content that FHIR core is mentioning are now on https://profiles.ihe.net. I entered https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-36234. not sure how to process this as it is not really workgroup specific. I would be glad to do the conversion.
We can take it up as an FMG issue. Anne, can you put it on the agenda?
@Grahame Grieve how do you want me to proceed? Should I make the changes and mark this as pre-applied?
make the changes and mark it as applied
Done. note the CR is updated as pre-applied.
@Lloyd McKenzie how do we process the jira ticket J#36234 ?
You need to un-assign it. Then you need to capture the resolved vote. Then you need to capture the resolution. Then you mark it as applied
At the last FMG meeting there was no vote. It was decided that the CR could be closed on the Program Directors authority. ... or something like that.
Move it to be a Technical Correction
Is it still 'assigned'? If so, click 'provide requested info'
okay. I didn't know that it would be okay for me to close it. done
